title: 3 Bedroom, 1 Bath in Narberth (407 Dudley St)
description:
$2,750/month for a 1 year lease.  $2,650/month for a 2 year lease
DESCRIPTION
This charming three-bedroom home with full bath, in coveted Narberth is nestled on a quiet street, with a covered front porch, great for enjoying your morning coffee. Enter through a light and airy living room with brick fireplace and hardwood floors that flows into the dining room, an updated kitchen and an outside exit to the fenced-in backyard that's ideal for gardening, playing, bbqing or simply relaxing. Upstairs there is a master bedroom overlooking the front yard, with two nice sized bedrooms, as well as a cheery full bath and hall linen closet in the hallway. The basement provides ample storage and also has a washer/dryer. You'll live a stone’s throw away to neighborhood favorites like the Narberth Movie Theater, The Great American Pub, The Greeks, and Village Treats and be a part of a town that was voted as one of America’s Top 100 Best Communities for Young People.  It is within walking distance to the Narberth Playground & the R-5 train and is just minutes away from Center City, Philadelphia. A Giant Supermarket, Whole Foods, Trader Joes, CVS, Rite Aid Pharmacy, Wawa, the Ardmore Farmers Market, Suburban Square, and a variety of restaurants are all within a 5 minute drive away. You will also have access to the Lower Merion School District (Belmont Hills Elementary School, Welsh Valley Middle School, Lower Merion High School), which is considered one of the best in Pennsylvania.
For additional information, visit the Narberth website to learn more about the town’s unique events throughout the year.
Zillow Walkable Score - 77 (Very Walkable)

description:
Situated on a quiet, sweet street in Washington Square West, 410 S Iseminger ticks all the boxes of trinity living. This two-bedroom, one-bathroom home features TWO outdoor spaces and has been beautifully updated for both modern comfort and historic preservation. Just through the front door, you’re greeted with a quaint living room with a well-maintained original fireplace and coat closet. Making your way downstairs, you’ll find the renovated kitchen with cellar door access to the street (for unloading groceries) and outdoor space. The kitchen has all new appliances, a new backsplash, and repointed exposed brick walls. The back patio is the perfect place to enjoy your morning coffee or work outside during a warm day. The first bedroom is found on the second floor of the home. Down the hall is the full bath featuring heated floors, a new toilet, and a new vanity. On the third floor of this trinity is the second bedroom with beautiful vaulted ceilings and exposed beams. Off of this bedroom is a little balcony. With two outdoor spaces, original hardwood floors, a basement for storage, central air, and close proximity to all your Center City favorites, you will LOVE living on Iseminger.

title: Discover this charming property in Philadelphia!!
description:
Center City West is a neighborhood within Center City, the downtown district of Philadelphia. This urban hub is one of Philadelphia's most desirable neighborhoods. The Center City West neighborhood encompasses some of the city's biggest attractions including the shopping, financial, and museum districts. It attracts its residents by not only hosting some of the city's leading institutions of art, science, and history, but also with its upscale restaurants and a booming nightlife. The options are endless: Laugh tears of joy at the Helium Comedy Club, have a shopping spree at the Shops at Liberty Place, or get a spectacular panoramic view 57 stories above the ground at the One Liberty Observation Deck. Nearby Rittenhouse Square is a popular spot for festivals and farmers markets while the Schuylkill Banks has excellent riverside running and biking trails with a view.

title: Welcome to Fitzwater Flats, your perfect new home!
description:
Welcome to Fitzwater Flats, your perfect new home! This stunning newly constructed building is situated in the heart of Philadelphia and offers six units of modern luxury living. Unit #301 is a beautiful 2 bedroom / 2.5 bathroom apartment, boasting ample natural light and a private roof deck for your relaxation and enjoyment. Each unit in the building comes equipped with top-notch security features, including front door security cameras, alarm systems, and smart home intercom systems. title: Sunny one bedroom apartment at Sansom and 50th
description:
Available May 5, 2023: sunny 1 bedroom apartment at Sansom and 50th in West Philly.
Please see the walkthrough video here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T2qclUVWQpM&feature=youtu.be
The apartment is the entire third floor of an approximately 100-year-old house. The street entrance and hallway up to the 3rd floor entrance is shared with only the 2nd floor resident.
The apartment has great light with windows in every room, old hardwood floors, and excellent access to transit.
The neighborhood features:
- Aldi (groceries) nearby at 46/Market
- SEPTA nearby with 46th or 52nd Street stations nearby, offering a ten-minute connection to Center City and a 15 minute connection to Old City (only six stops to Center City)
- good available street parking for cars
- Baltimore Avenue commercial corridor about 10 blocks south, with lots of pedestrian amenities including Clark Park and Cedar Park, Bookers, Carbon Copy Brewery, Mariposa Co-op, and Clarkville
- CVS at 49th/Market
- Malcolm X Park at 52nd and Osage
In terms of floor plan: the apartment opens to a hall with the bedroom straight in front. The bedroom has hardwood floors, a north facing window, an east-facing door to the roof with a window.
The hallway serves the bathroom, which has a tub and old-school tile, and a skylight.
The kitchen is relatively small, and has a stove with a natural gas oven with a north-facing window. The living room is the largest room, with a large set of west-facing windows, and and a closet.
There is a small closet in the hallway.
There is no carpet anywhere.
The apartment floor is heavily insulated from underneath, so the apartment is both warmer and quieter than others of the same age.
There is a laundromat one block away.
The owner allows one dog or one cat, provided that the owner is comfortable with that animal.
Smoking is not allowed in the unit or anywhere on the property, including the rear roof area, sorry.
The current resident is a social worker who is moving away after 5+ years.
The first floor resident is an elderly resident who has lived there for over 10 years.
Apartment is managed by owner who lives in the neighborhood. The owner works in a hospital, and fellow healthcare workers are particularly welcome!
If interested, please reply to this post and include some information about yourself and what brings you to West Philly. To confirm you read to the bottom of the ad, please mention your favorite color in the subject or body of your email, an interesting fact about your life, or anything interesting that you recently learned, or anything that shows you read to the end.
The apartment is available May 5, 2023. Virtual viewings and more photos will be available in early April.
The ideal tenant is someone who can appreciate an quirkier, older home, is respectful of the property and the other residents in terms of noise, enjoys natural light, and is interested in being in the same place for a few years.
